channel.title: Java error(i think)
channel.description: I can run a 508 perfectly fine but when i try and run a 317, the command box goes up then closes very quickly. this is what i have in my run.bat edit. [code]@echo off title Running... java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server exit[/code] If someone could help me, that would be much appreciated. Thanks.

item.title: Java error(i think)
item.dc:creator: @Im_Key Im Key
item.description:
@Im_Key wrote:

@echo off
title Running...
java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server
pause

Try that.

item.title: Java error(i think)
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

I can run a 508 perfectly fine but when i try and run a 317, the command box goes up then closes very quickly.
this is what i have in my run.bat edit.

@echo off title Running... java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server exit
If someone could help me, that would be much appreciated.
Thanks.
